subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Maria Sharapova, who won last week’s Acura Classic in San Diego, lost the first set in a little more than an hour after battling back from a 5-1 deficit.
snippet: The top-seeded Maria Sharapova, who won last week’s Acura Classic in San Diego, lost the first set in a little more than an hour after battling back from a 5-1 deficit.
